p: In contrast, litter amount had a much smaller, still significant effect, i.e. higher litter amounts led to taller seedlings ( Fig 3). Seedling height is the only response variable where the control was significantly influenced by soil type, i.e. ragwort conditioned soil led to significantly taller seedlings (3.9 ± 0.5 cm vs. 2.6 ± 0.3 cm).
